GetMemberRankRuleList.Statement:
-- 全件数取得 DECLARE @row_count int SELECT @row_count = ISNULL(COUNT(member_rank_rule_id), 0) FROM w2_MemberRankRule [[ MEMBERRANKRULE_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
-- 該当情報取得 SELECT w2_MemberRankRule.*, @row_count AS row_count FROM ( SELECT w2_MemberRankRule.member_rank_rule_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( [[ MEMBERRANKRULE_SEARCH_ORDER_BY ]] ) AS row_num FROM w2_MemberRankRule [[ MEMBERRANKRULE_SEARCH_WHERE ]] ) AS RowIndex INNER JOIN w2_MemberRankRule ON ( RowIndex.member_rank_rule_id = w2_MemberRankRule.member_rank_rule_id ) WHERE @bgn_row_num <= RowIndex.row_num AND RowIndex.row_num <= @end_row_num ORDER BY RowIndex.row_num ASC

GetMemberRankRule.Statement: SELECT w2_MemberRankRule.* FROM w2_MemberRankRule WHERE w2_MemberRankRule.member_rank_rule_id = @member_rank_rule_id

UpdateMemberRankRule.Statement: UPDATE w2_MemberRankRule SET member_rank_rule_name = @member_rank_rule_name, --status = @status, --last_count = @last_count, --last_exec_date = @last_exec_date, target_extract_type = @target_extract_type, target_extract_start = @target_extract_start, target_extract_end = @target_extract_end, target_extract_days_ago = @target_extract_days_ago, target_extract_total_price_from = @target_extract_total_price_from, target_extract_total_price_to = @target_extract_total_price_to, target_extract_total_count_from = @target_extract_total_count_from, target_extract_total_count_to = @target_extract_total_count_to, target_extract_old_rank_flg = @target_extract_old_rank_flg, rank_change_type = @rank_change_type, rank_change_rank_id = @rank_change_rank_id, mail_id = @mail_id, exec_timing = @exec_timing, schedule_kbn = @schedule_kbn, schedule_day_of_week = @schedule_day_of_week, schedule_year = @schedule_year, schedule_month = @schedule_month, schedule_day = @schedule_day, schedule_hour = @schedule_hour, schedule_minute = @schedule_minute, schedule_second = @schedule_second, valid_flg = @valid_flg, last_changed = @last_changed, target_id = @target_id, target_extract_flg = @target_extract_flg, target_id2 = @target_id2, target_extract_flg2 = @target_extract_flg2, target_id3 = @target_id3, target_extract_flg3 = @target_extract_flg3, target_id4 = @target_id4, target_extract_flg4 = @target_extract_flg4, target_id5 = @target_id5, target_extract_flg5 = @target_extract_flg5 WHERE member_rank_rule_id = @member_rank_rule_id
